title: Nvidia Is Said to Prepare to Abandon $40 Billion Arm Deal
itunes:title: Nvidia Is Said to Prepare to Abandon $40 Billion Arm Deal
description:
Dr. Harold Paz, Executive Vice President for Health Sciences at Stony Brook University, discusses seeing a decline in omicron cases in the New York area and the importance of booster shots. Bloomberg News U.S. Semiconductor & Networking Reporter Ian King reports on Nvidia quietly preparing to abandon its purchase of Arm from SoftBank Group. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News U.S. Health Care Reporter Cynthia Koons talk about the U.S. still playing from behind with inadequate Covid testing. Steven Skancke, Chief Economic Advisor at Keel Point, provides a preview of Wednesday's FOMC decision. And we Drive to the Close with Amanda Agati, Chief Investment Officer at PNC Asset Management Group.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
